issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

G2 (2.2) G1 (1.6) simulator (2.1) TiMobile SDK 1.5.0.add5e1

Android, button fails when mixing touch and trackball
1.BaseUI>Views>Scroll Views>Basic
2.Use the trackball to give ficus and press "add to scroll view" button
3.use your finger to scroll all the way down
4.Use the trackball to give focus and press "scroll to top"

results: fails for the first press. Not seen when using only trackball or only touch.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: button fails on first press when mixing touch and trackball

comments.body: Closing ticket as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
